snippet.title: UNDEAD BLOCKS BETA NEW GAMEPLAY AND USER INTERFACE! WORLD'S FIRST AAA P2E FPS ZOMBIE SHOOTER!
snippet.description:
Undead Blocks beta now accessible to Weapon Loadout NFT holders! This video will demonstrate new Undead Blocks gameplay and UI integrations!
#nft #nftgames #nftgaming #ethereum #blockchain
Undead Blocks is the world's first play-to-earn FPS game. Launching on the ETH network, Undead Blocks will allow players to purchase Weapon Loadout NFTs, use their weapons to overwhelm zombie hordes, and then upgrade their NFTs using ZBUX. Undead Blocks has partnered with Kevuru Games to provide players with an immersive AAA first person shooter gameplay environment.
